tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: This Professor\'s one class is both poorly designed and badly run. The course is remarkably shallow in content, mostly do to her attempt to cover such a large amount of the Bible in such a small amount of time. Most of the work is based on Discussion Board questions that require oddly specific answers and are generally poorly asked.

comments: A nice woman who relates everything in the Bible to sex. Very precise, so follow her directions to a T, break up your work into smaller sections, and get extra help from her in the library.

comments: VK is a very nice lady, go to her extra help sessions, and do all extra credit and you will get an A. Instructions are very dificult, but she will walk you thru with extra help. Very passionate about religion.
